Name: 30 days in red army
About the game: 30 Days in red army is in early access - during development we will add more events, minigames, alternative endings, achievements and statistics. Studio Eny Project does not support the war and is against any suffering that the war or any 'special military operation' can bring. As the result of this attitude, we would like to present you a simple text RPG game about soldier life in the red army. The game does not aim to alleviate the violence and suffering of people affected by the war, but, on the contrary, to ridicule those who unnecessarily prolong its duration. So do not hesitate to try to survive 30 days in red army against tough enemy resistance and all odds caused by incompetence of the red army.
